title: yahoo62278
author: yahoo62278
created_time: October 27, 2023, 05:50:51 PMLast edit: November 10, 2023, 01:24:44 AM by yahoo62278
content: Emorya Finance team WILL SPEND the equivalent of $12000 usd in TOKENS FOR ITS  BOUNTY CAMPAIGN. I DO NOT DISTRIBUTE THE TOKENS, THAT WILL BE HANDLED BY THE TEAMDISTRIBUTION DATE 11/11/2023Must make a proof of registration in this thread to join. Stakes only count for users who fill the forms to join. Click Website below to visit the companies website. Click wallet below to get the MVX wallet.WEBSITEWALLETSPREADSHEEThttps://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1aAM9GdB3koE1jzS2I6avGZZF6W4Hb6OqwfZu4zsqtno/edit?usp=sharingFINAL SPREADSHEEThttps://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1fiY9IFXgjg8EYgrR4sydkWLQQ2V0nKFg-yvwdyyDMZM/edit?usp=sharingTWITTERequivalent of $7000 in tokens availableRULES1.You must follow the official twitter account:https://twitter.com/EmoryaFinance2. Must like 5 tweets on EmoryaFinance page3. Must make 5 comments from the List of provided comments. Mix it up, don't just choose the 1st 5. Randomly pick 5 off list https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1TkBteaM8p7eRsASCYsu7ObvEc3zWxHGev3HwadDjRVc/edit?usp=sharing4. Must tweet 5 times original comments of yours about the project5. Must use #EmoryaFinance in all tweets/retweets/comments6. Must use a comment from list provided to comment on all 10 statuses/tweets provided Must use #EmoryaFinance in your commentPART 1https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/16NJldTFwfH5A5LnsxXqDPjBOqgs1fdNuq48mfF8tQ14/edit?usp=sharing 10/27-11/1PART 2https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1YAlIf97xlsst2a4a3R_pBaYH3Dwm6OCmXoYxXSjRElA/edit?usp=sharing 11/1-11/3PART 3https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/19bAG2REnCWPAJd6rYa1a0xU1IAmUuxkRSBRIzgklSFo/edit?usp=sharing  11/3-11/8PART 4https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MLqvW-foS4mtjFdp3iT2wtnjVulzP7wZiLMKEFyVBRE/edit?usp=sharing 11/6-11/87. Twitter accounts must be cryptocurrency related, real and have atleast 90% of real followers (twitter audit).8. Reports must be turned in before I close the form on 23:59 TUESDAYSREWARDS200-1999 Followers : 1 Stakes.2000-4999 Followers : 2 Stakes.5000 plus Followers : 4 Stakes.HOW TO JOINFill out this FORMFill out this FORM PART 2Fill out this FORM PART 3Fill out thisFORM PART 4TELEGRAMequivalent of $3000 in tokens availableRULES1. Must join https://t.me/EmoryaFinanceInternational2. Must make 5 constructive comments per week 3. Comments must be a full sentence and make sense4. Each qualifying comment gets 1 stake(max 5 per week)5. Each person is only allowed to participate 1 time. If found enrolling alts, all your accounts get 0 HOW TO JOINFill out this FORMCOINMARKETCAPequivalent of $2000 in tokens availableRULES1. Must follow https://coinmarketcap.com/community/profile/emoryafinance/REWARDS]1 stake per follow[MAX 2000]HOW TO JOINFill out this FORM

comments.body: The project website and wallet website are designed really cool, especially the wallet looks really niceHow long will bounty last? One week? When does it begin and when does it end?When will spreadsheet be published?

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: Bitum on October 27, 2023, 06:03:04 PMThe project website and wallet website are designed really cool, especially the wallet looks really niceHow long will bounty last? One week? When does it begin and when does it end?When will spreadsheet be published?Bounty will last until November 8th. I'll post the sheet in a few hours, begins now BTW. Most bounties are ready to start or accept work once they are posted unless it says in the title a different start date.

comments.author: Cornia
comments.body: In twitter campaign,  what's the meaning of rule 4? "4. Must retweet 5 times original comments". We have to do 5 retweets or comnents?

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: Quote from: Cornia on October 27, 2023, 06:27:10 PMIn twitter campaign,  what's the meaning of rule 4? "4. Must retweet 5 times original comments". We have to do 5 retweets or comnents? Twitter has a bunch of parts. Like 5 tweets made by the team, post 5 comments from the list I provided, 5 original tweets from you guys, and then 10 statuses you must comment on using the list of comments provided.
